description: Magnesium is a lightweight, silvery metal important for both biological and industrial systems. It burns with a bright white flame and forms strong, lightweight alloys used in automotive and aerospace engineering. In living organisms, magnesium plays a key role in enzyme function and photosynthesis. Industry uses it in metal refining, electronics, and construction. Magnesium’s combination of strength, lightness, and biological significance makes it a versatile and highly valued element.
name: Magnesium
